data.text: @Matteo_DeP Hola Matteo. Can you please send the associated email and full name in a private message so I can review? Regards
@acssrv Hemos revisado y respondido tus mensajes directos. Déjanos saber por ese medio en caso de cualquier duda. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6

@acssrv Hola, nos gustaría tener más información sobre el incidente. ¿Iniciaste una reclamación en el aeropuerto?, ¿tienes un código PIR asociado?. Déjanos saber todos los detalles por DM para revisar e indicarte cómo proceder. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@SiriSAppel Hola Siri. We don´t know the details of what happened, please send a DM with more information so we can help you. We remain at your disposal. Regards
@MozCris Hola Cris. We understand that the management is being handled directly with the reservation's owner. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

@reperfiled2 Hola, como te indicamos en comentarios previos, tu caso ha sido escalado y seguimos a la espera de una actualización por parte del área a cargo. En cuanto tengamos cualquier novedad te notificaremos de inmediato. Saludos.

@eeeeebcux Hola Cocolatina. We understand that you have contacted our colleagues via phone. Could you please provide us  the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa so we'd be able to consult the status of your request from here? We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards

@MozCris Hola Cris.  Please provide us your full name, PIR code and the details via direct message  https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI so we'd be able to consult from here.  We remain at your disposal. 
Kind Regards
@JonnyBramley Hola Jonny, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference number and full name https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@ramm_steiner Hola, we're sorry to read this. Since Vueling operated the flight and opened the PIR, they are the only ones able to assist you. Please contact Vueling directly. Best regards

data.text: @Ari_Reinventada Hola Ari, sentimos leer lo que nos comentas, no tenemos registro de un caso tuyo por este canal. Si tienes una consulta pendiente con nosotros nos gustaria que nos acreditaras los detalles por MD para saber como asistirte, esperamos tu respuesta. Saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@jelanify Hola Jelani. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@PandooYaar Hola Ahad, how we can help you?
@gabiru_29 Hola Gabriela, nos sorprende leer tu comentario, ¿tienes una reclamación pendiente?, ¿nos cuentas más?, quedamos atentos

We explain how pressurisation works and why it's so important👉🏼https://t.co/JiOIVNdN3W 
(3/3)

urls.title: Presurización en los aviones: ¿por qué es necesaria?
urls.description: ¿Has notado los oídos taponados durante un vuelo? Se debe a la presurización en los aviones. Así funciona este mecanismo perfecto.

data.text: It's because of the difference in pressure between the air in the middle ear and the air outside caused by the change in altitude. ✈️ To be able to fly so high, a process is carried out in the cabin known as... (2/3)
Ever wondered why you have ringing in your ears at take-off and landing? 🤔 (1/3) https://t.co/BgHkLr65Zs
@WurieHaja Hola Haja, we're sorry for the inconvenience. In case you need further assistance, please send us a DM with your claim reference number and email address https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@emmaclairehdgsn You're welcome, Emma. We remain at your disposal
@emmaclairehdgsn Hola Emma, we are glad that everything has been modified. We remain at your disposal.
@emmaclairehdgsn Hola Emma, we sent your request, we will contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@EvelienDer Hola Evelien, we will check the case with our team and contact you as soon as possible. Regards.
@emmaclairehdgsn Hola Emma, we replied to it, could you reply? Thank you!
@stratfordjones Hola, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with all details of your complaint, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

@reperfiled2 Hola, seguimos muy pendientes del tema, el caso está escalado internamente y en revisión. Sentimos que este demorando dado que involucra a más de un departamento. Tan pronto tengamos novedades te haremos saber. Saludos
@rb2676 Hola Cave, please send us all the details about your inquiry in a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1UII) , including your booking code and ticket number so we can verify. We remain at your disposal.
@moreneta_l Hola Mar, has de consultar sí es posible, en mostradores al inicio de tu viaje. Saludos
@trekwithtony Hola, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the booking code, email address and ticket number related to the voucher you mention  https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@trekwithtony Hola, we're sorry to read this and have just replied your DMs
@GaryCorben We're glad to read this, Gary. We remain at your disposal
@emmaclairehdgsn Hola Emma. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@GaryCorben Sorry, Gary. Our last DM to you is from 13h ago. We will re-send it
@verushka1980 Hola, desde esta vía no podemos indicarte nada diferente. Saludos
@pirolalla Hola Laura, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@pirolalla Hola Laura, in this case British Airways issued your ticket, please contact them directly. Regards.

data.text: @GaryCorben Hola Gary, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@JasmineMackey6 Hola Jasmine, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM all details including you rcase number and registered email? Thanks in advnace https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@verushka1980 Hola, Reiteramos nuestras disculpas. En este caos te comentamos que la operación puede sufrir actualizaciones constantemente. Si podemos ayudar en algo desde aquí, por favor déjanos saber. Saludos.
@eeeeebcux We apologize for the inconveniences. We hope to have news as soon as possible. Regards.
@CataHerraiza Hola. Nos sorprende lo que nos mencionas. Por favor déjanos saber todos los detalles de tu caso. Quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.
@tassillionaire Hello. We feel what you tell us. please send us all the details in a DM. Kind regards.
@sssolaiman Hello. We are very sorry that you have that impression. We have sent you a new DM. Regards.
@eeeeebcux Hello. We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards.
@AnneF60 Hello. We are very sorry for any inconvenience that may have arisen. please let us know if we can help you with anything from here. Kind regards.
@sssolaiman Hello. Thanks for writing to us. Please send us a DM with your PIR reference code and the associated full name. Kind regards.
@eeeeebcux Hola, have you opened a claim as we have indicated above? If so, we would like you to provide us with the file number, we are attentive to your answer by DM. Regards
@RickF645 Hola Rick, if you have any pending questions with us we would like you to indicate it by DM, we are attentive to the details. Regards

@PeetChelseapeet Hola Chelsea, unless it's an error, we don't see DM messages from you. We would like you to send us again the details of your consultation in that way to verify how to assist you. Regards https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

data.text: @melanniee___ Hola, we have responded to your DM, we’ll continue the communication there to avoid any confusions, best regards.
@melanniee___ Hola, we are unaware of the circumstances of your case, please send us a DM detailing the information of your claim so we can help you, best regards.
@verushka1980 Sentimos las molestias. Como lo indicamos vía MD, sugerimos verificar con nuestros compañeros en el aeropuerto. Desde aquí, estaremos muy atentos a tu caso. Saludos.
@aUKPanda You are welcome. Regards.
@verushka1980 Hola. Disculpa la demora en nuestra respuesta. ¿Los dos vuelos están bajo la misma reserva? Por favor envíanos un MD con todos los detalles. Saludos.
@aUKPanda Hello. If both flights are under the same reservation, we understand that it would be enough time. We remain attentive to any additional questions. Kind regards.

@_fernandanews Hola, Fernanda. gracias por escribirnos. Como lo anunciamos a través de nuestra canales oficiales, Sugerimos hacer caso omiso a la publicación que nos compartes. Quedamos a tu disposición. Saludos.
@FeysPerson Hello. We have sent you a new DM. Kind regards
@freaartsakh Hello. Thank you for your suggestion. We hope to have other titles of multimedia content in the future. Kind regards.
@oddjobjoeglenn Joseph, we understand that t the claim was not opened by you and in this case the owner needs to contact us so we can verify what happened.
@MrFellowG Hola Sam, please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with the claim number (P********-*********) so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.

@elbetzio Hola Sam, we are going to help you check this. Please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with your booking code and ticket number (075*****) so we can verify. We remain at your disposal, regards.
@NoLogsNoCrime Hola Ryan, to consult this further please contact us in a Dm to provide info of the booking and correction you are trying to make. Regards
@hawkey50 Hola Kevin, we are sorry to read about it. If you are still at the airport please make the formal luggage claim at counter. Regards

@kimsmouter Hola Kim, we are sorry about the inconveniences in the delay of your flight. Any update once there is a schedule departure will be informed by Iberia conecta sms/email. Also the airport colleagues will inform the passengers once they have an update. Regards
@Dennis_TM Hola Dennis. We're sorry to read this. Did you receive assistance from our colleagues at the airport? Could you please DM us with your booking details (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa)? Regards.
@tomasdev Hola Tomas, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with the booking code and email address related to the voucher you mention https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@micaela7sofia Hola Micaela, ¿que gestión o consulta tienes pendiente?, ¿nos das más información en un MD?. con gusto podemos asistirte por este medio, saludos https://t.co/HyIAB5Nru6
@JaimeGilPerez Hola Jaime, te enviamos una disculpa por las molestias del caso, esperamos el proceso continúe sin mayores inconvenientes, saludos

@IdelAlberto Hola, sentimos los inconvenientes generados a causa de esto, entendemos que nuestros compañeros están trabajando para agilizar la situación, te pedimos estar atento de las instrucciones del personal, saludos.
@GavinSlabbert You're welcome, Gavin
@JaimeGilPerez Hola Jaime, sentimos tu itinerario este sufriendo inconvenientes en esta ocasión, sigue las instrucciones de nuestros compañeros en tierra por favor, saludos cordiales
@GavinSlabbert Sorry, Gavin. Unfortunately, only Vueling will be able to assist you, since they operated your flight and opened the PIR. Kind regards

@EllieMNorman Sorry, Ellie. We've just replied your DMs
@DaytrippingRed We're very sorry and have just answered your DMs. Kind regards
@DaytrippingRed Hola, sorry for the delay. We've replied your DMs

data.text: @NatashaHallam11 Sorry, Natasha. Unfortunately, we can only cover first necessity expenses with toiletries and clothes. Therefore, the hotel stay refund doesn't apply. Apologies
@EllieMNorman Hola Ellie, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@DaytrippingRed Hola, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us by DM your booking details, code, ticket number, registered email and full passenger name to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@ebonyrb Thank you for the information Ebony, we have replied to your husband through his Twitter profile, we'll continue through that channel. Regards

data.text: @JorgeACassis Hola Jorge, nos alegra que hayas disfrutado del postre. Saludos
📢 Our flights from 9:30h onwards may be affected by this Eurocontrol warning. https://t.co/04Eh1y3kHk
@GavinSlabbert Hola Gavin, we have sent you the details about the correct contact for your claim by direct message. Please continue the conversation in that way. Kind regards.

@santoga Hola Gabriel, de momento no se tiene reportada incidencia con el formulario, sugerimos eliminar el historial y caché (F5) de igual forma los datos de billete y reserva deberán colocarse sin guiones ni espacios para que se pueda ingresar correctamente. Saludos

@rg8641 Hola, la imagen que adjuntas es una grabación con poca duración en donde no se puede ver completa la hoja de reclamo. Te pedimos enviar una imagen de la hoja de reclamación completa y legible. Con ello podremos revisar más sobre el caso. Gracias

@becks_5 Ian, as we requested before please send us a DM (https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa) with all the details about your flight, including the number flight, ticket number and booking code so we can check about this.
@GavinSlabbert Hola, could you please send us your PIR number and full name by DM? Kind regards.
@fadoue Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name and the PIR reference number https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@louise30223835 Could you please send us a DM with your Iberia booking code, full name and ticket number? https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@louise30223835 Hola Louise, we're sorry to read this. Could you please provide the flight number? This way we can verify if there's any news about it. If you prefer, you can send the details via DM https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@luca_photo name and Iberia booking code https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@luca_photo Hola Luca, we're sorry to read this. Notice that if all flights are under the same booking and the connection in Madrid is for less than 24h, usually the luggage should be collected only on her final destination. Please send us a DM with her full /1
@thirdcoastgems Hola, we're deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa

@NatashaHallam11 number, date of purchase and price, so the screenshots from the charges on your credit card aren't considered valid receipts. Did you have any expense with toiletries and clothes? If you did, send us a DM with the receipts https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

data.text: @NatashaHallam11 Hola Natasha, as we can see, you sent receipts of expenses with food and hotel, for which the refund doesn't apply. We can only cover first necessity expenses (toiletries and clothes, for example) you had for being without luggage. Also, the receipts must have the store's VAT /1
